1.name: Ahmet Y.
1.comment: Mr. Kenan was very helpful in finding our dream home. Thanks for the reliable and professional service.

2.name: Mehmet K.
2.comment: He guided us very correctly regarding the land we bought for investment. The only address for real estate in Trabzon.

3.name: Ayşe D.
3.comment: They managed a very fast and transparent process during the sale of our house. Thank you for your interest and concern.

4.name: Fatma S.
4.comment: They offered us the most suitable options in our search for a rental apartment. We were very satisfied.

AboutPage.title: About Us
AboutPage.heroDescription: Kenan Kadıoğlu Real Estate is a real estate consultancy company providing reliable, transparent and professional services in Trabzon and its surroundings with 15 years of industry experience.
AboutPage.contentDescription1: Since the day we were founded; we produce the most suitable solutions for our customers' needs with the principles of right investment, right valuation and right communication.
AboutPage.contentDescription2: While our portfolio includes residential, land, commercial real estate and investment projects; we serve each customer with a special analysis, accurate pricing and result-oriented working model.

trust.title: Trust and Transparency
trust.desc: We do not compromise on transparency and trust principles in all our transactions.

professionalism.title: Professionalism
professionalism.desc: We offer professional service with our experienced and expert staff.

pricing.title: Accurate Pricing
pricing.desc: We price over real value with market analysis.

satisfaction.title: Customer Satisfaction
satisfaction.desc: We always see customer satisfaction as our priority.

features: Strong portfolio in Trabzon and surroundings
Accurate valuation and real market analysis
Hundreds of successful transactions and customer satisfaction

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.desc: To ensure our customers reach their dream living space and help them make the right decisions in investment processes. To put trust, transparency and professionalism at the center of all our work.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.desc: To be a leading and exemplary brand in real estate consultancy in Trabzon and the Black Sea region; to constantly increase service quality based on technology, innovative solutions and customer satisfaction.

AboutPage.valuesDesc: Our core values that we adopt in all our activities
